title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. C, pt. 153 - Guidelines For Mortgage Modification Agreements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. C, pt. 153 - Guidelines For Mortgage Modification Agreements

State Regulations
§ 153.1 - Introduction-statutory authority of director of division of the budget to approve guidelines
§ 153.2 - Defined terms and construction
§ 153.3 - Criteria established in statute for mortgage modifications
§ 153.4 - Guidelines approved by director of division of the budget

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. C, pt. 153

Statutory authority: Private Housing Finance Law, §60

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
